OOC: I can't remember if he was strapped down... If he was well then consider 
his arms immobilized and no shots fired.  I'm too lazy to go look it up.  
Same goes for him being stripped of his weapons.

::Chaostaur::
       He looks over at her.  "Oh good I have company.  I hope the, 
Infectrons, you said?  Well, I hope they don't mind me killing you."  He 
lifts one arm with one of his heavy blasters.  He fires one shot that hits 
the wall several feet from his target.  "Oops... I guess I was out for too 
long."

--part1_139.89e9d66.298b030e_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
